description: Register favorite folders to provide quick access to them. Shortcut: WINDOWS+BACKSPACE

translations.description: Register favorite folders to provide quick access to them. Shortcut: WINDOWS+BACKSPACE
Registre las carpetas favoritas para acceder rápidamente a ellas. Acceso directo: WINDOWS+RETROCESO

translations.displayName: Dossiers favoris - Enregistrer les dossiers favoris
translations.description: Enregistrez vos dossiers favoris pour y accéder rapidement. Raccourci : FENÊTRES+ESPACE ARRIÈRE

translations.displayName: Pastas favoritas - Registre as pastas favoritas
translations.description: Registre as pastas favoritas para ter acesso rápido a elas. Atalho: WINDOWS+BACKSPACE
Registe as pastas favoritas para ter acesso rápido às mesmas. Atalho: WINDOWS+BACKSPACE
Hızlı erişim sağlamak için favori klasörleri kaydedin. Kısayol: WINDOWS+GERİ silme
Зареєструйте улюблені папки, щоб забезпечити швидкий доступ до них. Комбінація клавіш: WINDOWS+бекспейс

translations.displayName: 文件夹收藏夹 - 注册文件夹收藏夹
translations.description: 注册文件夹收藏夹，以便快速访问它们。快捷键：Windows+退格键
